name: Lemon, Honey and Thyme Frozen Yogurt
description: This ice cream is light and tart, as any good frozen yogurt should be, but with a deep, floral richness from the honey and a bright, herbaceous finish.
totalTime: 1 hour (depending on your machine's spin time)

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, whisk all the ingredients together. Adjust sugar and lemon juice to taste.
Spin in your ice cream machine, and enjoy!
